scripts.serve: cd functions && npm run build && firebase emulators:start
scripts.serveStord: cd functions && npm run build && firebase emulators:start --import ./data
scripts.shell: cd functions && npm run build && firebase functions:shell
scripts.pubsub: cd functions && npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only pubsub
scripts.functions: cd functions && npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.watch: cd functions && nodemon -e ts --exec "npm run functions"
